metadata.title: CVE-2021-47054 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: bus:qcom: Put child node before return Put child node before return to fixpotential reference count leak. Generally, the reference count of child isincremented and decremented automatically in the macrofor_each_available_child_of_node() and should be decremented manually ifthe loop is broken in loop body.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
